ðŸ“– Summary: JumpServer is an open-source Privileged Access Management (PAM) tool designed to provide DevOps and IT teams with secure, on-demand access to SSH, RDP, Kubernetes, Database, and RemoteApp endpoints. It acts as a bastion host, centralizing and securing access through a web browser, enhancing security and simplifying access management.
